name: CVE-2024-1183
description: An SSRF (Server-Side Request Forgery) vulnerability exists in the gradio-app/gradio repository, allowing attackers to scan and identify open ports within an internal network. By manipulating the 'file' parameter in a GET request, an attacker can discern the status of internal ports based on the presence of a 'Location' header or a 'File not allowed' error in the response.

name: CVE-2024-32399
description: Directory Traversal vulnerability in RaidenMAILD Mail Server v.4.9.4 and before allows a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information via the /webeditor/ component.

name: CVE-2023-1892
description: An XSS vulnerability on a Sidekiq admin panel can pose serious risks to the security and functionality of the system.

name: bluecoat-telnet-proxy-detect
description: Detects Blue Coat telnet proxy services.

name: CVE-2023-2227
description: Improper Authorization in GitHub repository modoboa/modoboa prior to 2.1.0.

name: crushftp-default-login
description: CrushFTP default login credentials were discovered.

name: crushftp-anonymous-login
description: CrushFTP Anonymous login credentials were discovered.

name: CVE-2024-0235
description: The EventON WordPress plugin before 4.5.5, EventON WordPress plugin before 2.2.7 do not have authorization in an AJAX action, allowing unauthenticated users to retrieve email addresses of any users on the blog.

name: CVE-2023-32077
description: Netmaker makes networks with WireGuard. Prior to versions 0.17.1 and 0.18.6, hardcoded DNS key usage has been found in Netmaker allowing unauth users to interact with DNS API endpoints.

name: titannit-web-rce
description: The vulnerability in the device enables an unauthorized attacker to execute system commands with elevated privileges. This exploit is facilitated through the use of the 'getcommand' query within the application,allowing the attacker to gain root access.

name: CVE-2024-27956
description: The Automatic plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection in versions up to, and including, 3.92.0 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

name: CVE-2024-31849
description: A path traversal vulnerability exists in the Java version of CData API Server < 23.4.8844 when running using the embedded Jetty server, which could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to gain complete administrative access to the application.

name: CVE-2024-24131
description: SuperWebMailer v9.31.0.01799 was discovered to contain a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulenrability via the component api.php.
